content: *this heart basket with flower divider is a 2-in-1 pattern and was designed for a live quick cal you can join the **free cal starting february 2nd 2024 for 3 days** releasing 1 pattern part per day the pattern will include 3 live video tutorials for each section of the pattern and extra support * > the free cal s pattern includes ads live video tutorials will be at 12pm pt on youtube 1 for part 1 heart basket rounds 1-23 on feb 2nd 2024 part 2 heart basket rounds 24-43 on feb 3rd 2024 part 3 flower divider organizer on feb 4th 2024 > and the only way to get the > pattern **ad-free and printer-friendly** > is in the **pdf** the **pdf > is cheaper on my website ** > so you can get the pdf here for $6 > or on my website for $5 > the pdf allows you to work at your > own pace as the entire pattern is > included in the pdf >**get the pdf here 2 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this cal pattern will also be released in my > crochet membership in parts which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 3 1 https //www youtube com/nickishomemadecrafts/live 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/heart-basket-flower-divider/ ref=raverly 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
